page.title: 11WHAT PEOPLE DO IN CONNEL
page.content: Unemployment is not a major problem in Connel.Many retired people live in the village. Connel is a delightful place with beautiful scenery so it is popular with the tourists.As a result many are employed in the tourist industry running guest houses,bed and breakfast establishments and hotels. At Dunbeg there is a Scottish Marine Biological Association Research Laboratory which employs about 90 people. There are a few farmers and crofters. The remainder of the people are employed in various occupations,such as civil service,engineering,banking, teaching,nursing,etc.Most of these people travel daily to Oban to work.
